title: Transformative Learning Design for Building Sustainable Higher Education Institutions

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of higher education systems and sustainability, with project-based learning experience
context.additional_context: Graduate science students explore practical strategies for sustainability challenges, with an emphasis on collaboration and critical thinking using personal devices.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the characteristics and transition processes of higher education institutions across sustainability levels (instrumental, conventional, green, sustainable).
Learners can design institutional innovation projects by applying transformative learning theories (single/double-loop learning, threshold learning).
Through PBL, learners can propose and evaluate action plans for higher education institutions linked to Sustainability Development Goals (SDGs).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
